HomePage.welcomeTextDescription: Websites built with technologies fresher than a batch of fresh donuts.

projects.name: Blackbell Studio
projects.shortDescription: Online shop with artworks from Blackbell Studio.

projects.name: Hexon.work
projects.shortDescription: Website with a dedicated CRM system for the energy industry.

timeline.title: IT Technical School
timeline.description: I started studying at an IT technical high school, learning the basics of programming, databases, computer networks and other IT-related topics.

timeline.title: First Website
timeline.description: In 2017 I created my first simple website using HTML, CSS and JavaScript about classic games like Mario and Donkey Kong.

timeline.title: PHP Journey
timeline.description: After finishing school I started learning PHP and opened my first one-person business.

timeline.title: Learning React
timeline.description: I wanted to grow in building web applications and came across the React framework.

timeline.title: Mentor
timeline.description: I met a mentor who helped me develop my skills.

timeline.title: Creating projects
timeline.description: I built websites and components and discovered new libraries and frameworks such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Stripe, ThreeJS, Chart.js and many more.

timeline.title: Online shops
timeline.description: I built online shops such as Blackbell Studio (artworks) and Zaklejki.pl (sticker shop).

timeline.title: Online platforms
timeline.description: I focused on creating online platforms for freelancers (Quixy.pl), nail stylists (Naily.pl) and a database of pizzerias in Polish cities (Pizzuj.pl).

HomePage.motivation: What I do as a front-end developer
HomePage.logicDesc: I mainly work on application logic, responsiveness, design and user experience (UX). I optimize and position websites using SEO techniques, programmatic SEO, performance optimization and marketing strategies (e.g. Google Ads) to ensure the best possible visibility in search engines.
HomePage.learningDesc: Programming drives me to continuous growth, discovering new ways of thinking and new technologies. I constantly look for opportunities to further improve my skills.
HomePage.visualizationDesc: Working with data visualization is satisfying; as a front-end developer I collaborate with graphic designers and UX/UI designers, and I also handle design on my own.
HomePage.storyDesc: I used to look at games or applications and wonder, 'How is this made? Is it difficult to create?'. After work I would fire up my development environment and tinker with code, exploring new technologies and solutions.
HomePage.plan1: Learning to utilize different programming languages and staying updated with technologies I use.
HomePage.plan2: Exploring the field of game development in my free time.
HomePage.plan3: Pursuing interests beyond programming, such as improving my drawing skills and mastering communication in the Dutch language.

home.title: Web development Pawel Wessel - Front-end Developer
home.description: I build websites and web applications, online stores, and run Google Ads marketing. I do graphic design and UI/UX.

about.title: How I became a front-end developer?
about.description: How I started programming, how I became a front-end developer, story, motivation, timeline and future plans.
